item.description:
8:20pm showing!   Meet in the lobby at the theater.

AMC Loews Boston Common 19 175 Tremont Street, Boston, MA (888) 262-4386 ‎ · amctheatres.com
It is a "video game style movie" check the links for info and trailer.

"TAI CHI ZERO opens Oct. 19th at AMC Loews Boston Common 19.

The film will play on a full schedule starting Friday 10/19 with at least 2 afternoon shows and 2 evening shows. The film’s runtime is 94 minutes.
Still images may be downloaded at: http://www.variancefilms.com/taichi0filmpage.html

Synopsis
In legendary Chen Village, everyone is a martial arts master, and uses a powerful form of Tai Chi in all aspects of their life. Yang has arrived to try and learn it, only to find that it's forbidden for the villagers to teach their secret style to an outsider. But when a mysterious man comes to town with a frightening steam-powered machine and plans to build a railroad through a village, the villagers realize they may have no choice but to put their faith in Yang, who has a secret power of his own. With action directed by the legendary Sammo Hung (Ip Man 1 & 2), Tai Chi 0 is a full-on steampunk kung-fu throw down that will knock you out of your seat.

Trailer: http://trailers.apple.com/trailers/independent/taichi0/

Facebook: www.facebook.com/TaiChiZero
item.how_to_find_us: Is anyone willing to be early and greet /find people as they arrive? please post in Comments!

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: OT: 8:20p showing of TAI CHI ZERO movie, a "steampunk kungfu throwdown"
